  • Method Details

    • submitOrder

      @PostMapping("/restaurants/{id}/submitOrder") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> submitOrder​(@CurrentUser UserPrincipal principal, @PathVariable java.lang.Long id, @RequestBody OrderRequest request)
      This method allows for an order to be submitted to a restaurant. We first fetch all the required models like the restaurant, current logged in user. Then, we create a delivery object. This object will be used by the delivery users. After, we convert the Order Request object to an Order object. We also create a RestaurantCustomer object and we add both of these to the restaurant.
      Parameters:
      principal - User principal
      id - Restaurant ID
      request - Order Request with all the necessary data to create an order.
      Returns:
      A 200 status code

    • getOrderConfirmation

      @GetMapping("/orderConfirmation/{orderNumber}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getOrderConfirmation​(@PathVariable java.util.UUID orderNumber)
      This method returns the information for an order matching the UUID orderNumber.
      Parameters:
      orderNumber - Order number
      Returns:
      A 200 status code with the order object.

    • getPastOrders

      @GetMapping("/restaurants/{id}/pastOrders") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getPastOrders​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long id)
      This method returns all the orders for the specified restaurant.
      Parameters:
      id - Restaurant ID
      Returns:
      A 200 status code with the list of orders.

    • getPastOrders

      @GetMapping("user/pastOrders") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getPastOrders​(@CurrentUser UserPrincipal principal)
      This method returns the past orders for the current logged in customer.
      Parameters:
      principal - User principal
      Returns:
      A 200 status code with list of order responses.
